text:
Hi all - Can anybody share insights into how the page editor is updating the content after a module field was changed?
In some cases it is not performing a live update, but requires the user to click the button “Apply Changes”, which initiates a re-rendering of the content.
We would like to understand which factors influence this to optimise our modules to allow live-updates as much as possible.
I am not sure 100%, but I think when you use require_css/js or scope_css then it's bring "Apply changes" button

Thank you <@U022YD6LGAU>!
We are testing and noticed that it is indeed related to require statements that are within a conditional block.
We will continue testing, but also noticed another issue. It seems that the JS event listeners are gone after a live update?
Hi! I am new to HubSpot, can I setup the marketplace free themes in my local environment?
